_landing.multi_format_support_description: Switch between Typst, LaTeX, and Markdown without leaving your document.
_landing.real_time_collaboration_description: Work with your team in real-time with seamless synchronization and no conflicts.
_landing.live_preview_description: See your changes instantly with a side-by-side preview that updates as you type.
_landing.ready_to_streamline_your_document_workfl: Ready to streamline your document workflow?
_landing.join_thousands_of_researchers_students_a: Join thousands of researchers, students, and professionals who are already using Hivey.

_features.hivey_competitor_features_1: supports multiple file formats, not just specific document types.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_2: integrates seamlessly with local file systems, eliminating cumbersome upload/download processes.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_3: preserves the original file format without conversion, maintaining compatibility with external tools.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_4: provides advanced collaborative features powered by CRDT technology for conflict-free editing.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_5: offers real-time cursors and presence awareness to enhance team collaboration.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_6: delivers superior user experience with multi-user cursors and real-time editing indicators.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_7: includes robust commenting and annotation systems for effective team communication.
_features.hivey_competitor_features_8: provides structured project management tools alongside editing capabilities.
_features.why_use_hivey: Why should I use Hivey instead of ...
_features.try_it_now_description: Experience seamless collaborative editing across multiple file formats powered by advanced CRDT technology for conflict-free real-time synchronization.
_features.try_it_now_button: Sign up for free, try it now!

_contact.contact_us_description: Contact us in case you have any questions about Hivey or want to give feedback. Use the contact form below. We look forward to hearing from you!
_contact.name: Name

_about_us.company_vision_description: The founding purpose of MGGA is to create customized office software for businesses and individuals. We aim to deliver more sustainable software products, lower the barriers to use for our users, and enhance productivity for both individuals and enterprises through our efforts.
_about_us.business_cooperation_description: Alibaba has commissioned MGGA to develop an online collaborative editor called Hivey. Once the product is delivered, it will initially serve as the designated editing tool for Alibaba's internal employees and may later be made available to the public as appropriate.

_terms.below: Below, you can find our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service for using Hivey website and services. If you have any questions or concerns, please
_terms.what_information_do_we_collect_descripti: We gather several categories of information to enhance your experience and ensure service security.  When signing up, you provide personal details such as your name and email.  If you opt for a paid plan, payment information is also collected.  While using our services, we automatically collect usage data, including project creation and file uploads, as well as technical information like your device type, OS, browser version, and IP address.  This helps us analyze usage patterns and improve service quality.

If you integrate third-party services like Google Drive or Dropbox with Hivey, we collect relevant account details and files you choose to upload.  We also use cookies and similar technologies to recognize your device, maintain session continuity, and gather analytical data about your interactions.  With your consent, we may collect data from external sources such as social media profiles or publicly available information you've shared online.  This helps us enhance your experience by integrating relevant content from these platforms into our services.
Overall, our goal is to collect only the information necessary to provide you with the best possible service while maintaining transparency about what data we gather and how it's used.
_terms.how_do_we_use_your_information: How Do We Use Your Information?
_terms.how_do_we_use_your_information_descripti: We use the collected information to enhance your experience, operate our services effectively, and communicate with you meaningfully. Your data enables us to provide and personalize the services you request, such as securely storing your projects and offering customized features based on your preferences.

Your information is crucial for maintaining service security and integrity. We monitor accounts for suspicious activity and use technical details like IP addresses to prevent unauthorized access and fraud. Additionally, we may use your data to comply with legal obligations, such as responding to court orders or subpoenas, ensuring our services operate within the bounds of the law.

We might share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist in delivering our services, like cloud storage or payment processing partners. These providers are contractually obligated to protect your data and use it only for specified purposes. In rare cases, we may also disclose your data if required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety, as well as that of our users and the public.

We are committed to ensuring your data is used responsibly and transparently. We will always strive to inform you about how your information is being used and will provide options for you to control your data where appropriate.
_terms.what_are_your_rights_description: We recognize and respect your rights over your personal data. Depending on the jurisdiction you are in, you may have the following privacy-related rights:
_terms.access: Access: You can request access to the personal data we hold about you to review and verify its accuracy.
_terms.rectification: Rectification: You have the right to request correction or updating of your personal data if it is inaccurate or incomplete.
_terms.deletion: Deletion: You may ask us to delete your personal data, subject to legal and operational constraints.
_terms.restriction_of_processing: Restriction of Processing: In certain cases, you can request that we limit the processing of your personal data.
_terms.data_portability: Data Portability: You have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
_terms.objection: Objection: You can object to the processing of your personal data in certain circumstances, such as direct marketing.
_terms.withdrawal_of_consent: Withdrawal of Consent: If you have consented to the processing of your data, you may withdraw your consent at any time.
_terms.acceptable_use_description: By using Hivey, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service.  If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our services.  You are responsible for ensuring that your use of Hivey complies with all applicable laws and regulations.
_terms.account_registration_and_security_descri: To access certain features of Hivey, you may need to register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
_terms.service_availability_description: We aim to provide continuous service, but we may need to suspend or modify services due to maintenance, emergencies, or other circumstances beyond our control. We will make reasonable efforts to notify you of any planned service interruptions.

_marketing.one_editor_all_formats_description: Collaborate in real-time while seamlessly previewing your work in Typst, LaTeX, or Markdown.
_marketing.the_collaborative_editor_for_all_your_do: The collaborative editor for all your document formats.
